profileAlternative.name: Nathan Myers
profileAlternative.headline: All C++, All the Time
profileAlternative.summary:
C++ and C library design; ISO C++ language standardization, and standard library design, implementation & conformance tests; User-space journaled file system design and implementation; Networked server design & implementation; High-availability system design and implementation; Communication encryption/security design and implementation; Distributed database communications infrastructure.
Engineering staff at Bloomberg, IBM/Aspera, Aspera, Codesourcery, ITA Software, Zembu Labs, Rogue Wave Software, Mentor Graphics, Sonatech, Videx.
Principal of Linux Laptops Ltd.
Consultant to Required Technology, Cygnus Support, Plum Hall.

Specialties: Software system architecture, C++ coding, Network protocol engineering, Secure communication, Performance optimization, Language standardization, Linux & Unix configuration.

aboutAlternative.text:
C++ and C library design; ISO C++ language standardization, and standard library design, implementation & conformance tests; User-space journaled file system design and implementation; Networked server design & implementation; High-availability system design and implementation; Communication encryption/security design and implementation; Distributed database communications infrastructure.

positions.title: Staff
positions.description: Maintain foundation C++ libraries; Advance support in C++ Standard for contract annotations; teach programming fundamentals.

positions.title:
Title
Software Architect
positions.description: System engineering on a data communication product. Communication security, parallelization, progress & debug logging, performance optimization, library design. Designed cryptosystems for in-flight and on-disk data security, wide-area symmetric distributed database for file tree synchronization.

positions.title: Software architect
positions.description: Architect, code, analyze C++ library components for high-performance embedded multi-processor vector / signal / image processing library; optimize and troubleshoot C++ runtime support libraries for Gcc compiler targets.

positions.title: Software systems engineer
positions.description: Analyze, specify, design, and implement software solutions involving large-scale networked data flows; aid other engineers with C++ language, standard, and design expertise.

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: Oversee work of junior engineers. Conduct interviews. Real-time network system coding in C++. Specify distributed- database failure recovery procedures. PostgreSQL development. Remote system control scripts, in Python.

positions.title: Chief
positions.description: First vendor concentrating on portable linux systems.

positions.title: Contract engineer
positions.description: Implement core of ISO 14882 C++ Standard library, libstdc++, for GCC project. Identify compiler bugs.

positions.title: Engineer
positions.companyName: R o g u e W a v e S o f t w a r e

educations.title: Oregon Graduate Institute
educations.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering

received.text: Robert is the second youngest person I have known who understands the whole of the C++ language, and is able to apply that knowledge to build systems from scratch with skill and taste.  Anyone would be fortunate to have his help on important work.

I have worked with Dave for years, on and off, since our work together on the ISO C++ Standard.  His software design skills are beyond criticism, and the true depth of his patience and his reliability have not yet been discovered.  You want to work with Dave Abrahams.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Crazy about C++ passionate bug preventer and meticulous code reviewer. Active Member of C++ Community.
